commit_list.message: The queue holds closures instead of a hash of params, @step now calls that closure
View it on my blog, link to docco.
Improve comments, remove some redundant code. Clean up index.html.
Improve pop() and remaining() so reset() doesn't need to alter the queue directly.
Bug in reset, remove callback, increase map density

Flesh out draw, add callbacks to generate.

index.html now has a 530x530 canvas. Draw is a bit more fleshed out and functions adequately. Still need to setInterval for drawing tiles in sequence rather than all at once.
Add draw_terrain, reorganise generate, change size of canvas
Add methods to push and pop from the queue
Remove generated files from source control
Add various comments for Docco and cleanup code
Renamed and rewritten to sit within a container object.
Initial commit. Looks like x and y are inverted.

A few changes to the about page etc.
A bit more info on bitcoin
How to get a show cancelled
Replace __FILE__ with require_relative where possible. Use ./ within config.ru.
Switching to MyFonts web fonts instead of Typekit
Post: source code for terrain generation
Remove javascript href and use onclick
Try to force UTF-8 file load
Fix various for 1.9.2 to upgrade Heroku to Bamboo

Alter pre style so that text overflows nicely
Add clarification about spade operator vs +=
New post: building strings in ruby
New post: Guild Wars Profession Icons

Ignore Gemfile.lock

Updated bundler, so now a Gemfile.lock has appeared.
Update now that I've actually made the tweet
New post: Final Fantasy: 4 Heroes of Light
A new link in the 'permalink' section that allows reader to tweet post.

Add 'tweet' method to the post class

Create an hash of parameters based on the post, in this case
title and url. Then flatten that hash into an escaped URL that
can be sent to Twitter's share functionality.

Marlo Stanfield.

His name is his name.

Marlo Stanfield.

His name is his name.

Move TypeKit call outside of jQuery $(window).load

Initially I thought it would be better to delay calling TypeKit
but actually this causes problems, such as boxes being sized
based on one font, then the font being replaced and text not
into the box properly.
Added a 404 condition when 0 posts are returned from the model.
Use a dark shadow  above headings instead of a light one  below.

Replace multiple '/blog' routes with single regexp

Use a single regexp with optional matches instead of several
routes for each possible request. Also reduce the number of
ways to call the 'blog' method within the app.

Replace multiple '/blog' routes with single regexp

Use a single regexp with optional matches instead of several
routes for each possible request. Also reduce the number of
ways to call the 'blog' method within the app.
Add a drop shadow to heading text and parameterise most colors.

Modified posts with videos to be 2 cols wide

Added 'Cols: 2' to any post containing the string '<object'

Added the Google Wave logo

Signed-off-by: baxter <paul.boxley@gmail.com>

Changed styling on <pre> and drop_shadow.

Given <pre>s a 1px rounded border to make them look inset. Offset the drop shadow on articles and the header by 1px right and downward to improve how the inset looks.

Signed-off-by: baxter <paul.boxley@gmail.com>
